text: Lyceum College is a college in South Africa. It is a wholly owned division of The Education Investment Corporation Limited, (EDUCOR). It is a wholly owned division of The Education Investment Corporation Limited, (EDUCOR). ICESA Education Services Purchased Educor as a going concern, and took control thereof in January 2008. ==Ranking== ==External links== *Official Site *Damelin Correspondence College - also falls under Educor Category:Distance education institutions based in South Africa Category:Colleges in South Africa
title: Lyceum College
